question: Who among the following was first woman judge of India?
explanation: It took four decades after independence for Supreme Court to have its first women judge {Justice Fathima BeeviÂ was the first female judge of the Supreme Court of India whose tenure lasted from October 6 1989 to April 29, 1992. The second was Justice Sujata V Manohar, from November 8, 1994 to August 27, 1999}.
